SELECT mem_num, mem_email, mem_nick, mem_birth, mem_genderCode, mem_branchCode, mem_admin_auth FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, mem_num, mem_email, mem_nick, mem_birth, mem_genderCode, mem_branchCode, mem_admin_auth FROM eatstamp.member, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP
AND mem_admin_auth != 1
AND mem_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY mem_num DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eatstamp.member
AND mem_admin_auth != 1
AND mem_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT r.report_num, r.mem_num, r.mem_num2, r.report_why, r.report_ynCode, r.s_num, r.cmt_num, r.report_return, m1.mem_email AS mem_email1, m1.mem_nick AS mem_nick1, m2.mem_email AS mem_email2, m2.mem_nick AS mem_nick2
FROM eatstamp.report r
JOIN member m1 ON r.mem_num = m1.mem_num JOIN member m2 ON r.mem_num2 = m2.mem_num
WHERE r.report_num = #{report_num}
SELECT mem_nick, mem_email FROM member WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num}
SELECT mem_nick, mem_email FROM member WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num2}
